pullRequest.title: [CoronaStats] Initial contribution
pullRequest.bodyText: COVID-19 affects at the moment our lifes all around the world. There are some OpenHAB users, who are interested to integrate some statistic data about the cases into there smarthome. There is a discussion inside the COVID-19-Thread  how to integrate the statistics from https://corona-stats.online/ via old http-binding and jsonpath transformation. This binding encapsulate this information.

beforeCommit.message:
[CoronaStats] Finished initial development

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

nodes.bodyText: Please remove the empty lines between the fields.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,67 @@

+ * http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

+ * SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0
+ */
+package org.openhab.binding.coronastats.internal.dto;
+
+import static org.openhab.binding.coronastats.internal.CoronaStatsBindingConstants.*;
+
+import java.util.HashMap;
+import java.util.Map;
+
+import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNullByDefault;
+import org.eclipse.smarthome.core.library.types.DecimalType;
+import org.eclipse.smarthome.core.types.State;
+import org.eclipse.smarthome.core.types.UnDefType;
+
+/**
+ * The {@link CoronaStatsCountry} class holds the internal data representation of each Country
+ *
+ * @author Johannes Ott - Initial contribution
+ */
+@NonNullByDefault
+public class CoronaStatsCases {
+    private int cases = -1;
+

nodes.bodyText: I would suggest to remove this channel - this is nothing we usually have and there is already the updated channel on the things that should be more relevant.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<thing:thing-descriptions bindingId="coronastats"
+	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+	xmlns:thing="https://openhab.org/schemas/thing-description/v1.0.0"
+	xsi:schemaLocation="https://openhab.org/schemas/thing-description/v1.0.0 https://openhab.org/schemas/thing-description-1.0.0.xsd">
+
+	<bridge-type id="bridge">
+		<label>Corona Stats Online - Bridge</label>
+		<description>Bridge for accessing data from https://corona-stats.online/ website.</description>
+
+		<channels>
+			<channel id="refreshed" typeId="refreshed"/>
+		</channels>
+
+		<config-description>
+			<parameter name="refresh" type="integer" unit="min" min="15">
+				<default>30</default>
+				<label>Refresh Interval</label>
+				<description>Time between two API requests in minutes. Minimum 15 minutes.</description>
+			</parameter>
+		</config-description>
+		
+	</bridge-type>
+
+	<channel-type id="refreshed">

nodes.bodyText: Please create an individual channel type for each channel (and move the label texts from the thing definitions to here).

commit.message:
[CoronaStats] Initial contribution bridge is running

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

[CoronaStats] Country thing working

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

[CoronaStats] Finished initial development

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

[CoronaStats] Fixed small checkstyle findings

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

[CoronaStats] Bridge and world thing merged

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

[CoronaStats] Merge Bridge and world thing in README

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

[CoronaStats] First draft DisvoceryService

Signed-off-by: Johannes DerOetzi Ott <info@johannes-ott.net>

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,126 @@
+# CoronaStats Binding
+
+This binding provides the statistic about cases of COVID-19 from the website https://corona-stats.online/.
+
+
+## Supported Things
+
+This binding supports a `world` thing, which polls the dataset in an adjustable interval as a bridge and provides the statistics for the whole world.
+The `country` thing, representing the statistics for a specified country.
+
+## Discovery
+
+This binding will add a default `world` thing into the Inbox. This can be used as bridge for country things you may add manually.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,126 @@
+# CoronaStats Binding
+
+This binding provides the statistic about cases of COVID-19 from the website https://corona-stats.online/.
+
+
+## Supported Things
+
+This binding supports a `world` thing, which polls the dataset in an adjustable interval as a bridge and provides the statistics for the whole world.
+The `country` thing, representing the statistics for a specified country.
+
+## Discovery
+
+This binding will add a default `world` thing into the Inbox. This can be used as bridge for country things you may add manually.
+
+## Thing Configuration
+
+### World
+
+| Property  | Default | Required | Description                                                                              |
+| --------- | :-----: | :------: | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
+| `refresh` |   30    |    no    | Define the interval for polling the data from website in minutes. Minimum is 15 minutes. |
+
+### Country
+
+| Property      | Default | Required | Description                                       |

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,126 @@
+# CoronaStats Binding
+
+This binding provides the statistic about cases of COVID-19 from the website https://corona-stats.online/.
+
+
+## Supported Things
+
+This binding supports a `world` thing, which polls the dataset in an adjustable interval as a bridge and provides the statistics for the whole world.
+The `country` thing, representing the statistics for a specified country.
+
+## Discovery
+
+This binding will add a default `world` thing into the Inbox. This can be used as bridge for country things you may add manually.
+
+## Thing Configuration
+
+### World
+
+| Property  | Default | Required | Description                                                                              |
+| --------- | :-----: | :------: | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
+| `refresh` |   30    |    no    | Define the interval for polling the data from website in minutes. Minimum is 15 minutes. |
+
+### Country
+
+| Property      | Default | Required | Description                                       |
+| ------------- | :-----: | :------: | ------------------------------------------------- |
+| `countryCode` |    -    |   yes    | 2-letter code for the country you want to display |
+
+For the correct 2-letter country Code have a look at the website https://corona-stats.online/
